name: Factory Live
description:
We did this game for the Mini-Ludum Dare #70 "Determinism" gamejam.

Game play:

Help our guy in the factory make a good impression on his first day at work. You need to click the buttons in the right order to build the different objects on the factory line. You have a time-limit for each object, what gets shorter as the level progresses.

Controls: Click the buttons at the bottom of the screen in the right order as those shown above the guys head (from left to right.)

It's a small game where you need to be quick, and where you will need to use your memory too. We hope you will enjoy. Good luck.

Game developer: SpriteyFrog

Art made by Gica using Gimp and Manga studio.

Sfx made in BFXR.
